      • defaultHttpClient

        public static org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient defaultHttpClient
        Default http client to use to send request to weixin server. Provide class-scope http client, which is used when httpClient is null, major for single-account use. You can tweak this with your own. This will takes effect on follow-up request whose httpClient is unset.

      • httpClient

        public org.apache.http.impl.client.CloseableHttpClient httpClient
        Http client to use to send request to weixin server. Provide object-scope http client, major for multi-account use. You can directly set this field. This will takes effect on time when .execute() is called.

      • conf

        protected java.util.Properties conf

        public WxpayRequestBase setProperties(java.util.Map aConf)
        batch setProperty
        参数:
        aConf - a Map contains key-value pairs, where key must be String, and values must implement toString() at least.

      • build

        public abstract WxpayRequestBase build()

      • sign

        public abstract WxpayRequestBase sign()
                               throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                      java.lang.IllegalStateException
        sign SUB-CLASS MUST IMPLEMENT THIS METHOD TO BE CALLBACKED.
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if sign_type is other than MD5
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Key or something else (related to algorithm) not found
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • sign

        protected java.lang.String sign(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames)
                         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        参数:
        paramNames - key names to submit, in dictionary order
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • signMD5

        protected java.lang.String signMD5(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames,
                       java.lang.String key)
                            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        caculate sign according to wxp-spec
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if your runtime does not support utf-8.

      • toQueryString

        protected java.lang.String toQueryString(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames)
        Provide query string to sign(). This method do not parse sign, thus toURL() must not invoke this method.
